EmailTemplate.subject: Your personal and local RIMOWA client advisor
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr, Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
Your RIMOWA has now been a companion for awhile now and we hope it has been trustworthy throughout your travels.
On behalf of the RIMOWA team, I would like to introduce myself as your personal client advisor. I will be happy to assist you in any way and remain at your disposal.
To prepare your future journeys, I would love to welcome you in {!Account.Local_Main_Store__c} to offer a complimentary **check-up of your suitcase / hot-stamping of your luggage tag **.
Should you be interested, I would be happy to organise your visit in-store.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
